```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(e1071)
HousePriceData <- read_csv("C:/Users/BSK/Downloads/HousePriceData.csv") #reading housepricedata
View(HousePriceData)
#factoring
HousePriceData$POSTED_BY <- as.factor(HousePriceData$POSTED_BY)
HousePriceData$UNDER_CONSTRUCTION <- as.factor(HousePriceData$UNDER_CONSTRUCTION)
HousePriceData$RERA <- as.factor(HousePriceData$RERA)
HousePriceData$READY_TO_MOVE <- as.factor(HousePriceData$READY_TO_MOVE)
HousePriceData$RESALE <- as.factor(HousePriceData$RESALE)
#training data
TrainingData <- HousePriceData %>% filter(TEST == 0)
#test data
TestingData <- HousePriceData %>% filter(TEST == 1)
#estimating classifier
train_model <- svm(TARGET.PRICE_IN_LACS. ~POSTED_BY+ UNDER_CONSTRUCTION+ RERA+ BHK_NO.+ SQUARE_FT+ READY_TO_MOVE+ RESALE+ ADDRESS+ LONGITUDE+ LATITUDE, data = TrainingData)
#predicting test
TestingData_pred <- predict(train_model, TestingData)

```
